personGroupId.description: ID of the person group. IDs are generated by the broker in the offer request and must be reported back by the insurer in the offer. Groups with the same benefits should not be combined, but this may occur (edge case). However, the insurer may add new groups of persons, in which case a new ID must be generated and reported back to the broker. Where changes are made to the content of the group (e.g., reassignment of persons), a new ID should be generated.

personGroupDescription.description: Name of the group of persons

numberOfPersonsFemale.description: Number of women. If unknown, value 0 can be specified. Required for offer request.

numberOfPersonsMale.description: Number of men. If unknown, value 0 can be specified. Required for offer request.

numberOfPersonsTotal.description: Total number of persons. If unknown, value 0 can be specified. Required for offer request.

payrollFemale.description: Daily sickness benefits salary total for women

payrollMale.description: Daily sickness benefits salary total for men

payrollTotal.description: Total daily sickness benefits salary for men and women

maxSalary.description: Maximum salary in CHF. Required in offer.

averageAgeMale.description: Average age of the persongroup, only needed if the total amount of persons in the persongroup is less then 4

averageAgeFemale.description: Average age of the persongroup, only needed if the total amount of persons in the persongroup is less then 4

uniformPremiumRate.description: Unit premium rate i.e. no distinction should be made between men and women in the premium rate.

premiumPersonGroup.description: Premium of the insured group of persons. Must be set for offer and omitted during request.
